CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 10, 1961, page A11, reads: "Alpha Wives - Officers and committee chairmen who worked to make the annual bridge luncheon of the Alpha Wives a success last Saturday at the Hilton Hotel, are, seated, left to right: Mmes. Mary Gloster, Gladys McCullough, president; Lillian Adams, general chairman, and Constance Cundieff. Standing, in the same order: Mmes. Marian Fountain, Cecile Springer, Eleanor Jennings, Palestine Zellars, Mary Hall Page, Mary Jane Page, Billie Brown, Doris Clark Brown, Lola Givens, Marguerite Walker, Olliemae Guice and Madelyn Hairston. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Alpha Wives, seated from left: Mary Gloster, Gladys McCullough, Lillian Adams, Constance Cundieff; standing: Marian Fountain, Cecile Springer, Eleanor Jennings, Palestine Zellars, Mary Hall Page, Mary Jane Mitchell Page, Billie Brown, Doris Clark Brown, Lola Givens, Marguerite Walker, Olliemae Guice, and Madelyn Hairston, in Hilton Hotel for luncheon
